title: Yu Yu Hakusho English Dub 001-112 BD (1280x720 AAC)
description:

Yup, 16:9 Yu Yu Hakusho, English Dubbed. Encoded Down from the 1080p (4:3) Remaster Source to 720p 16:9. It was originally 4:3 but you know... I don't like watching anime at 4:3 unless I have to. 

Q:But anon, stretching anime is bad! why?
A: If you don't like the fact that I stretched these a little you don't have to download it. I just enjoy the widescreen experience, it honestly doesn't look bad. 

Q: Why the English Dub?
A: Because Toonami, That's why.
